Title: The Top Leadership Wins and Fails of 2022
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, sits down with Kacy Maxwell, the executive director of marketing for EntreLeadership. George and Kacy look back on the top leadership wins and fails of 2022 and give their thoughts. They talk about Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and the Russia-Ukraine war, Elon Musk and Twitter, Jeff Bezos awarding Dolly Parton $100 million, Mark Zuckerberg derailing Facebook, and a small-business owner helping children overcome hair-loss issues. It’s going to be a roller coaster, so buckle up and hang on!


You’ll learn:

•      The top CEO fails of 2022

•      What President Volodymyr is getting right in the Russia-Ukraine war

•      If Elon’s leadership could ruin Twitter

•      Why Jeff gave Dolly $100 million

•      If Mark is derailing Facebook

•      How a small-business owner is helping children overcome hair-loss issues
